bibl.author: Matthew F. Pleasants
bibl.title: Matthew F. Pleasants to Henry Stanbery, 3 February 1868
bibl.idno: Entry 10, Record Group 60, Letter Book G

body.ab: I have the honor to state for your information, that it appears, from the regular record in this office of the dates of Commissions of District Attorneys of the United States, that the office of District Attorney for the District of West Virginia is vacant.
Very Respectfully, sir, your obd't sv't.
